name: The Things You Do For Love
name_original: The Things You Do For Love
description:
CONTENT WARNING/MILD SPOILERS
  • Screen Shaking
  • Physical Violence
  • Drugging
  • Stalking
  • Drowning
  • Obsessive Behavior
  • Strong Language 
  • Depictions of Blood
  • Self-loathing
TO DATE OR TO ELIMINATE?  THAT IS THE QUESTION.

You think you're in love. They make your heart skip a beat, your train of thought miss a stop, and your mind lose control. It feels so nice, and so you crave that. You crave them.

This is what love feel like, right? 

STORY ❤

Play as a (questioning) love-stuck romantic who is trying to understand these complicated feelings while pursing their crush and taking down the competition! Urgh, there's so much to do but so little time to do it as prom is in three days!

Stalk your crush? 

Eliminate a rival? 

Or, perhaps make a new friend along the way? 

Just go win love — no matter what, no matter how!

FEATURES ❤
  • A yandere MC with name and pronoun customization
  • Around 20k words (approx 2hrs of reading)
  • A colorful cast of not-so-archetypical schoolmates whom you can either "romance", befriend, or commit an illegal offense against!
  • An abundance of cheesy romcom and yandere tropes
  • 10 endings (with multiple variations depending on your choices)
  • 10 beautiful CGs that capture both the cute and horrifying side of all things that is love 
CAST ❤ CREDITS ❤

WRITING, PROGRAMMING, GUI DESIGN: miseri accordion

SPRITE ART: zallestars (Twitter | Itch)

CG ART: Nelion, LuluCat

BACKGROUNDS (EDITED): Uncle Mugen, Unsplash, Pexel, Flickr

MUSIC: James Blackwell (Bandcamp | Itch), Tsundere Twintails, Oneul, KK, zukisuzuki, Kazuchi, hisohkah

SFX: Court Records, Freesound, Mixit, Pixabay, davidferoli, YouTube Audio Library

ADDITIONAL ASSETS + FEATURES: Witpop (additional sprites), npckc (pronoun tool), Jaime Scribbles Games (extras screen), Flaticon

KUDOS ARE APPRECIATED ❤
